page.title: 03THE WHITE CLIFFS OF RAMSGATE
page.content: Ramsgate first developed as a fishing port in a gap in the white cliffs,which dominate the coastline.They are made of chalk which is a soft rock.Because of the softness,changes are being made at the cliff-face.Weaknesses or fault- lines are attacked by waves and small caves begin to form.The fissures become wider,caves collapse and inlets or geos are formed.The East and West Cliffs are protected from sea-erosion by roads and beaches.However,the cliffs are still unstable and chalk falls have occurred. Several stretches along the West Cliff have been re-inforced with concrete over the past few years.The East Cliff has more stability due to the strengthening work done some years ago. When the new by-pass road is built, taking constant heavy traffic along the base of the cliffs,what effect will vibrations have on the cliff structure?
